titulo: Improved reliability and optimised operations and maintenance for wind energy systems
descricao: Expected Outcome:Project results are expected to contribute to all of the following expected outcomes:Limit the risks related to wind energy systems (e.g., operational, financial, climate) and thus reduce the wind energy projectsâ€™ uncertainties;The European wind energy supply chain strengthens its strategic autonomy, technology leadership, competitiveness, and technology export potential. Scope:Proposals are expected to address at least four of the following aspects:Develop and validate solution
